item.title: 2024 Christmas Light Show
item.description: Sadly, not a lot of time for videos this year.

item.title: 2022 Christmas Light Show
item.description: Bringing a little extra joy to your season!

item.title: 2021 Christmas Light Show
item.description: Get warm, cozy, and snuggle up to see our 2021 Christmas show!

item.title: All About the Show
item.description: Probably more than you ever wanted to know about our holiday light show and how we put it together.

item.title: Christmas 2020
item.description: Ok, being honest, Halloween 2021 wasn’t our first light show. I did, in fact, build something that was impressive for what it was.

item.title: The Rules
item.description: We hope everyone enjoys the show. We also want to keep providing this bit of entertainment around the holidays. For that reason, we ask that everyone who stops by to please be safe and considerate of our neighbors.
